articles.title: Scientists Shed New Light on Mystery of Infant Consciousness - SciTechDaily
articles.description: An international research team from Trinity College Dublin, along with collaborators in Australia, Germany, and the USA, has discovered evidence suggesting the presence of some form of conscious experience from birth, and possibly during the late stages of pr…
articles.content: An international research study reveals that infants might possess conscious experiences from birth, integrating sensory and cognitive responses to understand their environment. This pioneering work,… [+3140 chars]
